step_feedback.feedback: Your initial clasping is good. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in future repetitions.
You're doing well with raising your hands. Focus on keeping your elbows closer together as you move them behind your head.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a key part of the stretch.
Holding the stretch is good. Ensure your head stays upright and you're not pulling forward.
Returning to the start is well executed. Keep up the controlled movement.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your wrists straighter and your elbows closer as you bring your hands behind your head. This helps you get the most out of the stretch.
